name: I Woke Up To This
description:
A short horror game about dreaming of a surreal environment. Your friend is dead.

This was an indie project to test WebGL story mode-like game development, I can say I enjoyed it!

Controls:

W A S DMoveLeft Mouse ClickInteract

Yeah, that's all the controls for this game.

Fullscreen is recommended.

Don't complain about the intro taking too long, please. (If bugs appear then it's intentional)

Big thanks to Smilerin for play testing and lore

Nobody did actually wake up to this... I hope.
